name: White Sand Beaches
description: You're standing on a white sand beach. Shells cover the sand near the water. Waves from the sparkling blue ocean crash over the beach before receding. Far to the east you can see a lighthouse. The beach continues to the east and west. You could also travel north into the sand dunes.

features.look: There are shells of all different shapes and sizes. They've been washed white by the sun and smoothed by the ocean waves. None of them are particularly impressive, though.
